newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian F16 crashes in east Belgium.
newsitem.headline: Belgian F16 crashes in east Belgium.

text.p: A Belgian F16 fighter jet crashed while on a training mission on Tuesday near the east Belgian town of Geetbets, the air force said.
"All I can tell you at the moment is that the F16 crashed and the pilot managed to eject safely," a spokesman said, adding that an investigation team was on its way to the wreck.
The Interior Ministry said the jet crashed in a field near the town and there were no civilian casualties.
